sentences.en: A sacred fount of untold power, It'saturated every fiber of our being.
sentences.cn: 一眼浸润我们每个人血管的无尽的力量之泉.

sentences.en: Although traditional advisory and underwriting services have recently improved, trading has been the fount of profitability.
sentences.cn: 尽管传统的咨询和承销服务情况有所改善, 交易却一直是盈利的主要来源.

sentences.en: Character master: A photographic or digitized fount which is used to create typeset images.
sentences.cn: 字符母片: 用来产生字体影像的一副照相或数码字体.

sentences.en: Digital fount ( font ) : A typeface fount converted to digital form for storage on magnetic medium.
sentences.cn: 一副数码字: 一副印刷字体转换为数码形式,以贮存于磁性媒体上.
一副字: 英文是美氏写法.

sentences.en: Her speeches have ever been a fount of inspiration to her audiences.
sentences.cn: 她的演说对于听众来说永远是灵感之源.

sentences.en: Resident fount : In laser printers , founts which are suppiled by the manufacturer. Also known as Internal fount.
sentences.cn: 常用字款: 在激光印字机内,由制造商供应的字款. 亦称内置字款.

sentences.en: She treats him as if he were the fount of all knowledge .
That old man is a fount of wisdom.
sentences.cn: 那个老人有无穷的智慧.

sentences.en: The old man is a fount of wisdom.
sentences.cn: 这位老人有无穷的智慧.

sentences.en: To the young boy his father was the fount of all knowledge.
You and have floated here on the stream that brings from the fount.
sentences.cn: 你与我漂浮在河流之上,正因为我们都来自相同的源泉.

trans.tran_en: the place, person, idea etc that all knowledge,  wisdom  etc comes from
